name: react-stampit
description: A specialized stampit factory for React.

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir dist --stage 1
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run lint && babel-node --stage 1 node_modules/.bin/tape test/basics.js test/props.js test/compose.js

author: Tim Routowicz <troutowicz@gmail.com>
